Ingest_LDD.name: Clipper
Ingest_LDD.comment:
The Clipper dictionary contains classes that describe aspects of the Europa Clipper Orbiter mission and related instruments.
Clipper version 1.0.0.0 (2020-04-10) Trent Hare, Initial version, to provide initial generic mission attributes

DD_Attribute.name: mission_phase_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The mission_phase_name identifies a time period within the mission.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_start_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft_clock_start_count attribute provides the value of the spacecraft clock at the actual start of image acquisition. There may be small inconsistencies with start_date_time due to varying correlation between UTC and the spacecraft clock. For purposes of data analysis the spacecraft clock value should be used. The format of this field is compatible with the NAIF Toolkit software where s = seconds converted from the clock's coarse counter and m = seconds converted from the clock's fine counter.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_stop_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft_clock_stop_count attribute provides the value of the spacecraft clock at the actual end of image acquisition. There may be small inconsistencies with stop_date_time due to varying correlation between UTC and the spacecraft clock. For purposes of data analysis the spacecraft clock value should be used. The format of this field is compatible with the NAIF Toolkit software where s = seconds converted from the clock's coarse counter and m = seconds converted from the clock's fine counter.

DD_Attribute.name: release_number
DD_Attribute.definition: Release_number is the number of a scheduled release of data from PDS. The first data release would be Release 1. The release_number for a given product is always the first release in which it appears, and does not change if the product is revised later.

DD_Attribute.name: orbit_number
DD_Attribute.definition: The orbit_number attribute identifies the number of the orbital revolution of the spacecraft around a target body. This value can optionally be set to 0 for cruise images or not set at all.

DD_Attribute.name: producer_institution_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The producer_institution_name attribute identifies a university, research center, NASA center, or other institution associated with the production of a data product.

DD_Attribute.name: product_type
DD_Attribute.submitter_name: The product_type attribute indicates the processing level of an individual data product.
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: product_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The product_version_id attribute identifies the version of an individual data product.

DD_Attribute.name: rationale_desc
DD_Attribute.definition: The rationale_desc attribute describes the rationale for performing a particular observation.

DD_Attribute.name: data_quality_desc
DD_Attribute.definition: The data_quality_desc attribute describes the data qualities associated with a data_quality_id attribute.

DD_Attribute.name: data_quality_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The data_quality_id attribute provides a numeric key which identifies the quality of data available for a particular time period. The data_quality_id scheme is unique to a given instrument and is described by the associated data_quality_desc attribute.

DD_Attribute.name: upload_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The upload_id attribute describes a spacecraft command set that is associated with the given data product.

DD_Attribute.name: flight_software_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: Indicates version of instrument flight software used to acquire image. For example, “1.00".

DD_Attribute.name: command_sequence_number
DD_Attribute.definition: Numeric identifier for the sequence of commands sent to the spacecraft which include this image.

DD_Attribute.name: image_id
DD_Attribute.definition: Numeric identifier for this image within the onboard command sequence.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpa
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpa_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpga
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpga_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_scs
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_scs_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_telescope
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_telescope_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: begin_temperature_fpa
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: begin_temperature_fpa_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: begin_temperature_scs
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: begin_temperature_scs_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: middle_temperature_fpa
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: middle_temperature_fpa_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: middle_temperature_scs
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: middle_temperature_scs_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: end_temperature_fpa
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: end_temperature_fpa_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: end_temperature_scs
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: end_temperature_scs_raw
DD_Attribute.definition: TBD

DD_Attribute.name: mode
DD_Attribute.definition: Set to the mode value as commanded for both NAC and WAC observations.

DD_Attribute.name: compression_flag
DD_Attribute.definition: Indicates if lossless compression was commanded (0=no, 1=yes)

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_count_partition
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft_clock_count_partition attribute indicates the clock partition active for the spacecraft_clock_start_count and spacecraft_clock_stop_count attributes.

DD_Attribute.name: instrument_mode_id
DD_Attribute.definition: Records the commanded WAC mode: BW, COLOR, VIS or UV.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The commanded WAC instrument mode was BW.
The commanded WAC instrument mode was COLOR.
The commanded WAC instrument mode was VIS.
The commanded WAC instrument mode was UV.

DD_Attribute.name: exposure_code
DD_Attribute.definition: Records the commanded exposure code for a WAC observation.

DD_Attribute.name: lookup_table_type
DD_Attribute.definition: Always set to STORED.

DD_Attribute.name: nframes
DD_Attribute.definition: Records the commanded number of frames for a WAC observation.

DD_Attribute.name: interframe_delay
DD_Attribute.definition: Set to the value of the interframe delay between WAC framelets. Keyword can have values between 25/64 and 280/64 seconds, in 1/64 seconds increments.

DD_Attribute.name: interframe_gap_code
DD_Attribute.definition: Records the commanded interframe gap code for a WAC observation.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_preroll_count
DD_Attribute.definition: Set to the sclk string for the start of an observation preroll acquisition.

DD_Attribute.name: preroll_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The UTC time and date at the start of the image acquisition command, corresponding to the acquisition of 1024 lines at the given exposure prior to the actual image acquisition.

DD_Attribute.name: dac_reset_level
DD_Attribute.definition: Records the commanded DAC reset level for the NAC

DD_Attribute.name: line_code
DD_Attribute.definition: Records the commanded value for the number of NAC lines to acquire, in 1024 increments. (LINES = LINES_CODE * 1024)

DD_Attribute.name: line_exposure_code
DD_Attribute.definition: Index range from 0 to 4095 each corresponding to one LINE_EXPOSURE_DURATION increment.

DD_Attribute.name: line_exposure_duration
DD_Attribute.definition: For NAC, LINE_EXPOSURE_DURATION can have values between 337.6 and 35,281.6 microseconds, in 128/15 microsecond increments (LINE_EXPOSURE_DURATION = [LINE_EXPOSURE_CODE * 128/15] + 337.6)

DD_Attribute.name: maximum_brightness_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum brightness temperature value measured within the image.

DD_Attribute.name: minimum_brightness_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum brightness temperature value measured within the image.

DD_Attribute.name: spatial_summing
DD_Attribute.definition: Onboard spatial average of NxN set of pixels, where N is the value of the keyword. SPATIAL_SUMMING = 1 implies that no spatial averaging has been applied to the image. .

DD_Attribute.name: time_delay_integration_flag
DD_Attribute.definition: Status of onboard algorithm which applies a temporal average of successive lines in an IR image; when enabled, THEMIS TDI averages 16 detector rows to equal one line in an IR image. “ENABLED” or “DISABLED”.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The commanded time delay integration was enabled.
The commanded time delay integration was disabled.

DD_Attribute.name: uncorrected_sclk_start_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft clock value (in seconds) when the instrument was commanded to acquire an observation. This can differ from the spacecraft_clock_start_count by as much as 4 seconds, depending on which bands are acquired in the image.

DD_Class.name: Observation_Information
DD_Class.definition: The Observation_Information class provides information about a science observation.

DD_Class.name: EIS_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The class contain all the instrument specific attributes for the EIS WAC and NAC.

DD_Class.name: ETHEMIS_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The class contain all the instrument specific attributes for the E-THEMIS instrument.

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: clipper:error:sclk_rule_0: If clipper:spacecraft_clock_start_count and clipper:spacecraft_clock_stop_count are present, they must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, OR the partition number must be given by clipper:spacecraft_clock_count_partition.
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_description: If spacecraft_clock_start_count and spacecraft_clock_stop_count are present, they must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, OR the partition number must be given by spacecraft_clock_count_partition.
